title: 85/70/EEC: Commission Decision of 21 December 1984 on applications for assistance from the European Communities concerning exceptional financial support for Greece in the social field, submitted by Greece (1984) (Only the Greek text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 21 December 1984
on applications for assistance from the European Communities concerning exceptional financial support for Greece in the social field, submitted by Greece (1984)
(Only the Greek text is authentic)
(85/70/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN
COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amount of aid agreed for each project is indicated in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Hellenic Republic.
